SPY.quoteDetails: SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust (SPY) tracks the S&P 500 index, providing exposure to 500 large-cap U.S. stocks across multiple sectors.

DJI.quoteDetails: The Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJI) is a price-weighted average of 30 significant stocks traded on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) and the NASDAQ.

RUS.quoteDetails: The Russell 2000 Index (RUS) measures the performance of 2,000 small-cap U.S. companies based on market capitalization.

NDX.quoteDetails: The NASDAQ-100 Index (NDX) tracks the performance of 100 non-financial companies listed on the NASDAQ stock exchange.

TSLA.quoteDetails: Tesla Inc. (TSLA) is an American electric vehicle and clean energy company, known for producing electric cars, battery energy storage, and solar products.

AAPL.quoteDetails: Apple Inc. (AAPL) designs, manufactures, and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables, and accessories, as well as offers services such as the App Store, iCloud, Apple Music, and Apple TV+.

GOOGL.quoteDetails: Alphabet Inc. (GOOGL) is a multinational conglomerate that provides online search, advertising, and streaming services through its Google brand, as well as offers hardware products such as the Pixel smartphone and Google Home smart speaker.

AMZN.quoteDetails: Amazon.com Inc. (AMZN) is an American multinational technology company that focuses on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence.
